testimonials.quote: AppleStone's software has transformed how we manage our 500+ machines. We've increased revenue by 28% and reduced service costs by 35% in just one year.
The ability to integrate with our mixed fleet of vending machines was a game-changer. We no longer need multiple systems to manage different machine types.

blogPosts.title: New Payment Options Added
blogPosts.excerpt: We've added support for Apple Pay, Google Pay, and other digital wallet solutions to our platform.
blogPosts.author: Sarah Johnson
blogPosts.content:
We're excited to announce that we've expanded our payment options to include Apple Pay, Google Pay, and other popular digital wallet solutions. This update makes it even easier for your customers to make purchases at your vending machines.

New Payment Options

The following payment methods are now supported:

  • Apple Pay
  • Google Pay
  • Samsung Pay
  • PayPal
  • Venmo

blogPosts.title: Major Upgrade to Inventory Management
blogPosts.excerpt: Our latest update includes AI-powered inventory predictions and improved expiration tracking.
blogPosts.author: Michael Chen
blogPosts.content:
We're thrilled to announce a major upgrade to our inventory management system, featuring AI-powered predictions and enhanced expiration tracking capabilities.

New Features

This update includes several powerful new features:

  • AI-powered inventory predictions
  • Enhanced expiration date tracking
  • Automated reordering suggestions
  • Improved inventory reporting
